Room.Name: Bowyer's Shoppe
Room.ShortDescription: You are in a bowyer's shoppe.
Room.LongDescription: You can see all the intricate bows he as created and perfected. The elves take pride in their long history of bowmanship and perhaps make the best bows known to exist. It has been rumored that the elves also made the magical flame bow, but it was so long ago, no one really remembers. There is a famous elven bowyer who lives in the Enchanted Forest. His name is Llanandar. He might remember if the story is true.
